description: Interactive code and document workspace with syntax highlighting, live preview, and direct editing via CodeMirror 6

tool_definition.name: TDA_Canvas
tool_definition.description: Presents code, documents, or structured content in an interactive canvas workspace with syntax highlighting, live preview for HTML/SVG/Markdown, and direct editing capabilities. Use this for substantial content that benefits from a dedicated workspace rather than inline display.

content.description: The complete source code or document content to display in the canvas.

language.description: The content language: html, css, javascript, python, sql, markdown, json, svg, or mermaid.

title.description: A descriptive title for the canvas workspace.

sources.description: Comma-separated list of knowledge source documents that informed this content. Include when generating content based on retrieved knowledge documents. Format: 'Document Title (collection)', 'Another Doc (collection)'
